featured.text: Small amounts of regular activity, even just standing and moving around, throughout the day is enough to bring the increased levels back down.
However, the sea snake’s salt glands cannot handle the massive amounts of salt that would enter their bodies if they actually drank seawater.
Research shows that 31 amounts of exercise—even just 15 minutes a day—helps ease depression, enhance self-image, relieve stress, and much more.
And those small amounts of activity add up—30 minutes of light activity in two or three-minute bursts can be just as effective as a half-hour block of exercise.
Milk naturally contains salt and lactose, a sugar which the human body needs in small amounts to help stimulate water 25 .

definition.example: The amount of water in the bottle is two liters.
